description: Under poor lighting conditions, a mist elf could be confused with a human, Characteristics as their frames are taller and broader than those of other elves. Even their ears are not as pointed and M their faces not as angular. Grey elves declare this to ist elves are a mystical warrior race, and be a sign of their blood’s corruption but the daoine choose a king or queen from their most answer with a formal challenge to hand-to-hand able fighters. The monarch is advised by a combat, which tends to silence the offender quickly. Master of Lore, usually a high-level bard; a Master of They dress in vivid greens and blues, favouring short Mysteries, usually a wizard or sorcerer, and a Master tunics and capes that tie at one shoulder. Warriors of Faith, usually a druid but possibly a cleric instead. and sorcerers practice ritual scarring over their arms Below them, ranks and hierarchy blur as respect which, with war paint gives them a ferocious aspect is awarded by feats of war, skill and wits in equal when charging into combat. Their blood remains the measure. Daoine nobles are indistinguishable from most potent among the elves, and they can live even their subjects, as they must prove they are fit to rule longer than grey elves. while complying with the wishes of the monarch.
name: Physical Description

description: The lack of contact with the daoine is Tales and poetry are the backbone of the mist elves’ more a result of their rarity than of their hospitality. culture, with legends about heroes and wars taking The doors to their cairns are open to anyone who can precedence above all others. They value talent and find them, for they are hidden by enchantments that potential as much as accomplishments, and strive to test all the virtues the mist elves value. They are close meet that potential throughout their long lives. The friends to humans and dwarves, and gracious hosts daoine love riddles, believing their own existence to to halflings and gnomes. The daoine enjoy annoying be the greatest riddle of all. This passion for enigmas grey elves, while sharing songs and art with high brings them closer to the dark things of the world, elves. They maintain a respectful distance from wild where other elves fear to tread but the daoine step and wood elves, though they will never turn their kin forth undaunted by the warnings, and many have lost away. Rumours abound that they even accept drow as their lives and souls in this pursuit. The rest of the guests but no one has found definite proof of this. mist elves mourn these fallen brethren and thank them for the course they paved that others might learn from
name: Relations

description: Mist elves enjoy their freedom and chase their mistakes. after their own dreams with abandon, believing in the strength of the individual, much like the chaos the Mist elves are few, and fewer children are born each high elves follow. They hold the banner of good in successive decade. This has forced them to adopt their belief that material and spiritual wealth should half-elves more closely than any other sub-race, be shared with those less fortunate, and that the weak considering them full members of daoine society deserve protection by the strong. and allowed to marry pureblooded mist elves. Their blood is thinning because of this, but they trust that
name: Alignment

description: The daoine used to live in forests the strength of their heritage will last until they find a like high elves but their diminishing numbers have solution. forced them to seek homes easier to defend. They now live in cairns built under hills, close to the surface but still hidden from view. Daoine hills are further Player Character Information protected by enchantments that confuse uninvited
name: Mist Elf Lands

description: The daoine’s eyes burn with purpose three tests: one of strength, one of skill and the last of and determination, and they tackle any challenge they wisdom. He will receive a warm welcome if he passes meet with the same energy and enthusiasm. Their all three but may die if he fails. bravado hides some sadness that expresses itself when the elf gets drunk or just awakens from trance. A mist Religion: Mist elves’ faith does not differ much from elf knows his people have their days counted, and the that of high elves, with the exception that they hold the only thing to do is enjoy the centuries they have left. fey in high regard as unwitting divine messengers and the gods’ true firstborn. 4 5 MIST ELF CHARACTERISTICS MIST ELF CHARACTERISTICS
